text: The Phantom of the Opera () is a French novel by Gaston Leroux. It was published in 1910. An English edition came out a year later. The book was adapted to a musical by Andrew Lloyd Webber in 1986. The musical was made into a movie in 2004. Movie versions include one starring Lon Chaney in 1925, one from 1943 with Claude Rains, another from 1962 with Herbert Lom, and The Phantom of the Paradise (1974). The story has been adapted to made for television movies several times. The band iron maiden made a song name the phanTom of the Opera from their self titled album iron maiden.
